ENTERPRISE APPLICATION DEVELOPMENT

Modern enterprise applications are generally business-critical, large scale software systems, complex in nature and mostly a group of interconnected sub-systems. Typically they are multi-platform, multi-device and multi-channels systems. Such systems must meet the stringent requirements for security, administration, and maintenance. With the in-depth expertise gained from several successful applications deployments, iAssure works directly with customers to overcome today’s challenges, combining the right technologies and skill sets. We approach enterprise application development by putting the user experience front and center. Leverage the rich experience of iAssure’s technical architects.


NodeJS / AngularJS

NodeJS/AngularJS are the next-gen & demanding skill sets, used for modern enterprise applications, where large number transactions are involved.


Microsoft Technologies

Being a Microsoft certified gold partner, iAssure has inherent strong technical capabilities in MicroSoft Technologies.


PHP Frameworks

We have developed several web applications and websites using PHP MVC frameworks such as Zend, Codeignitor, Symfony, etc.


Java Technologies

At iAssure, we have indepth expertise in J2EE, J2ME, Springs, Struts, Hibernet frameworks & Java based portal technologies.


Ruby on Rails

Ruby on Rails is a popular niche skill. iAssure is coming fast as a expert house of Ruby on Rails and planning to build its strong competency.


Python/DJango

iAssure has Architects & Senior Developers level experts of Python/Django skills, capable of large & complex web application development.

 

 

WHY iAssure?

Some reasons why you should choose ADM - Application Development & Maintenance Services from iAssure for your new project.


Modern Architecture

Enterprise Application Development is a completely architecture oriented business. The more powerful you are into solution & technical architecture, the better you can leverage the technological innovations and trends. Only experience can add the value to this composition.


Great User Experience

Emerging technologies are bringing the cutting-edge user experience. At iAssure, we keep experimenting and evolving the user experience for that 'wow' moment!


Return on Investment

iAssure's strong hold on various Opensource solutions, helps our clients identify a perfect fit opensource element for their Enterprise Application blueprint. A definite savings if your are looking from proprietary landscape.


Some Innovations

Rich experience of our talented work force would infuse numerous innovative ideas to improve the effeciency, scalability and flexibility of your Enterprise Application projects.

EFFICIENT & ROBUST ENTERPRISE APPLICATIONS

Efficiency and delightful user experience is the key of iAssure Solutions. We design for more reliable, robust & portable architecture, which gives you more control over the application's usability, ability to integrate them with 3rd party software and extend its life. Join hands with us for your next application development.
